original_text: And when I shall put thee out, I will cover the heaven, and make the stars thereof dark; I will cover the sun with a cloud, and the moon shall not give her light.
korean_text: 내가 너를 불 끄듯 할 때에 하늘을 가리어 별을 어둡게 하며 해를 구름으로 가리며 달이 빛을 내지 못하게 할 것임이여

sentences.original_text: And when I shall put thee out
and make the stars thereof dark
I will cover the sun with a cloud
and the moon shall not give her light
sentences.korean_translation: 달도 그 빛을 내지 않을 것이라
